info.name: DomainFactory Ugly Green Remover (df.eu)
info.description:
UPDATE: This style is obsolote, because they have luckily changed it.

This userstyle replaces the incredibly offensive green colored background from df.eu with a nice grey. I also removed the border from the body and put a nicer box-shadow

seriously who in the internal department had the idea for these green tones?!
info.additionalInfo:
v0.2.2
-set box-shadow and border to !important, so now all browser accepting this change (meh)
